products.facts: ["350 g is often used as a standard measurement for packaging materials, ensuring consistency in product weight.","Many products weighing 350 g are designed with recyclable materials to minimize environmental impact.","The quality of items at 350 g often reflects a balance between durability and lightweight design, catering to both functionality and ease of use.","In food products, 350 g can indicate portion sizes that align with dietary guidelines, promoting healthier consumption habits."]

["1.5 L bottles are typically made from PET (polyethylene terephthalate), a recyclable plastic that is lightweight and durable.","The recycling rate for PET bottles is around 30% globally, which helps reduce environmental impact when properly disposed of.","1.5 L water bottles can be reused multiple times if cleaned properly, contributing to reduced waste.","High-quality 1.5 L bottles are designed to be BPA-free, ensuring they do not leach harmful chemicals into the contents."]

products.name: Simply Tomato Ketchup

products.facts: ["Simply Tomato Ketchup is made with simple ingredients including tomatoes, vinegar, sugar, and salt.","The ketchup is free from high fructose corn syrup and artificial preservatives, ensuring a more natural taste.","The packaging is designed to be recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal and reducing environmental impact.","Simply Tomato Ketchup is gluten-free and suitable for various dietary preferences, maintaining high quality standards."]

products.facts: ["Polyana Kvasova is sourced from a natural spring located in the Carpathian Mountains of Ukraine.","The water undergoes minimal processing to retain its natural mineral composition.","It is known for its low sodium content, making it a healthier choice for hydration.","The packaging is designed to be eco-friendly, promoting sustainability and reducing plastic waste."]
